actions.text: Amendment SA 4509 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4509 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Jeffords. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6353) To provide that the Secretary of the Army shall not be considered an owner or operator for purposes of environmental liability in connection with the construction of an portion of the Fairfax County Parkway of the Engineer Proving Ground, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, that is not owned by the Federal Government.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4509 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Jeffords.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4509 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

purpose: To provide that the Secretary of the Army shall not be considered an owner or operator for purposes of environmental liability in connection with the construction of an portion of the Fairfax County Parkway of the Engineer Proving Ground, Fort Belvoir, Virginia, that is not owned by the Federal Government.
